text: Salesforce Tower is a skyscraper in Indianapolis, Indiana, United States. It is 247 meters (811 feet) tall and has 49 floors and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. It was built in 1990 and was named Bank One Tower. In 2004, its name was changed to Chase Tower because Chase Bank bought Bank One Corporation. In 2017, its name was changed again, to Salesforce Tower because Salesforce bought the naming rights. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world ==References== ==Other websites== * Chase Tower Website * Emporis.com - Chase Tower * SkycraperPage.com â€“ Chase Tower Category:Skyscrapers in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Indiana Category:Indianapolis Category:1990 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Indiana
title: Salesforce Tower (Indianapolis)
